title: New Pixel 3A - Searching for updates?
content:
Hi,

I was super excited to get my hands on a Pixel 3A today.
Added my new sim card and fired it up. 
Added my Wifi and password  and now it has been stuck on searching for updates for hours and hours. I have tried different Wifi's but honestly have no idea what else to do.

Does anyone have any idea? 
#suchabummer
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
